title: DecryptionShare
description: A single trustee's share of a decryption of some encrypted message `(a, b)`. The encrypted message can be an encrypted tally or an encrypted ballot.

share.description: The share of the decrypted message `M_i`.

proof.description: The proof that the share encodes the same value as the encrypted message.

fragments.description: The `k` fragments used to reconstruct this decryption share, if this trustee was absent.

DecryptionFragment.description: A fragment of a missing trustee's share of a decryption, including the LaGrange coefficient.

trustee_index.description: The index of the trustee who produced this fragment.

fragment.description: The actual fragment `M_{i,j}` which is trustee `j`'s piece of the missing trustee `i`'s share of a decryption.

lagrange_coefficient.description: The LaGrange coefficient `w_{i,j}` used to compute the decryption share from the fragments.

proof.description: The proof that the fragment encodes the same values as the encrypted message
